detailed_goals: Implement the core combat mechanics. This includes basic attacks, enemy AI for simple interactions, and hit detection.
Have a functional, albeit simple, combat loop by the end of the week.
Start with a very basic AI, like a simple 'chase and attack' behavior.
Design and implement the combat system architecture (damage calculation, hit detection, AI interface).
Implement basic AI classes and integrate them with the game world.
Implement basic attack animations and logic.
Create simple enemy AI (chase and attack).
Implement hit detection and damage application.
Ensure player and enemy characters have health values.
Concept art for basic attack animations and visual effects (e.g., impact sparks).
UI concepts for health bars and other combat-related information.
Detailed character models for the first enemy type.
Implementation of basic attack animations for both the player and the enemy.
